body: Being a dad is one of the best things a guy can do, just like how being a mom is one of the best things a girl can do. Normally getting two girls pregnant like that would be a nightmare but I think Shirou has a safety net with Iliya being rich...he's in a great position to start a large family. He should be super happy.
was hoping for more girl on girl action but still good stuff

Yuri and bisexual are oxymorons.  Yuri doesn’t exist if there’s a guy involved and the girls don’t love each other.  It’s so stupid and pointless to put yuri if you will just have them get fucked by men.
